Giscombe (amụrụ ya n'afọ 1950 Dayton, Ohio) bụ onye Africa-America na-ede uri, onye edemede, na prọfesọ nke Bekee na Mahadum California, Berkeley.
Onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na SUNY na Mahadum Albany na Cornell ebe ọ nwetara nzere, ọ bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke magazin Epoch na 1970s na 1980s

Ọ kụziri na Mahadum Cornell, Mahadum Syracuse, Mahadim Illinois State, na Mahadim Pennsylvania State.
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 2015, ọ na-akụzi na Mahadum California, Berkeley.
Ọrụ ya apụtala na Callaloo, Chicago Review, Hambone, Iowa Review, Boundary 2, wdg.
Nsọpụrụ na onyinye Giscombeńs gụnyere Stephen Henderson Award na Poetry, American Book Award, na Carl Sandburg Prize
Tinyere mkpakọrịta sitere na National Endowment for the Arts, ego maka idee abụ, Council for the International Exchange of Scholars, na Canadian Embassy
E nweela ọtụtụ nkwanye ùgwù n'oge ọrụ Giscombe.

Giscombe arụwokwa ọrụ dị ka onye ọkwọ ụgbọala tagzi, onye na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọgwụ, na onye na-arụ ọrụ n'ụgbọ okporo ígwè. Ọ kwetara na mmasị ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata n'ụgbọ oloko nwere mmetụta n'ihe odide ya, na-ekwu na ụzọ ụgbọ oloko ahụ "abụghị mmetụta..
nke jikọtara ya na ala na mmiri
